text:
Oh! Absolutely necessary
 Um, play equipment!

Is that necessary...? Paper plates and cutlery.
It's fine if they're from the 100-yen store.

...Ah, very important...!
In that case, wet wipes and such too...
Plates and hand wipes are absolutely necessary!

Um, I can only think of playing things...!
Like wanting to do soap bubbles or play frisbee.

Since playing is the main idea, I think that's fine.
Trash bags.

We have to take the trash back with us.
...Ah, snacks... What do you think?
